cooking_method: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Meanwhile, in a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook ground beef until browned.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add diced tomatoes, tomato paste, Italian seasoning, and red wine.
Simmer for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve sauce over spaghetti with Parmesan cheese.

ingredients: 2 pounds boneless, skinless chicken breasts, cubed
cooking_method: In a large skillet over medium-high heat, cook chicken until browned.
Add onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add garam masala, cumin, paprika, and turmeric, and stir to combine.
Add tomato sauce and bring to a simmer.
Reduce heat to low and stir in heavy cream.
Simmer for 10-15 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Serve with rice and garnish with cilantro.
In a large bowl, combine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, and croutons.
Add Caesar dressing and lemon juice, and toss to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve immediately.
